properties.headline: Flood Warning issued March 3 at 12:54AM CST until March 4 at 12:56AM CST by NWS Lincoln IL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Lincoln IL has issued a flood
warning for the following river in Illinois...

Little Wabash River below Clay City affecting Clay and Richland
Counties.

.Rainfall of a half to 1 inch fell over the Little Wabash River
basin Monday evening, resulting in additional rises on the
river. Minor flooding is expected near Clay City later this
morning as a result.

The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation, soil
moisture conditions, and forecast precipitation.

The National Weather Service in Lincoln IL has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Little Wabash River below Clay City.
* From early this morning until late tonight.
* At 1245 AM Tuesday the stage was 17.6 feet.
* Flood stage is 18.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by sunrise and crest near
18.1 feet later this morning. The river will fall below flood
stage this evening.
* Impact...At 18.0 feet, water begins to flood left bank farmland.
properties.instruction:
Persons with interests along this river need to prepare for flooding.
Stay tuned for further updates on this flooding situation.
